# Job Listing Website - Copilot Instructions

This is a modern job listing website that uses JSON as a database to store and display job postings in a card-based format.

## Project Features
- Turkish language support
- JSON database for job data
- Card-based UI for job listings
- Add new job functionality
- Responsive design
- Modern CSS styling

## Job Data Structure
Each job entry contains:
- Gereksinimler (Requirements)
- Ücret (Salary)
- İlan Linki (Job Link)
- Teknoloji (Technology)
- Süre (Duration)
- Ödeme Tipi (Payment Type: Saatlik/Fixed Price)

## Project Structure
- index.html - Main page
- styles.css - Styling
- script.js - JavaScript functionality
- jobs.json - Job data storage
